price: 43. Marjama! „Nuolankiai paklusk savo Viešpačiui (Allahui, negarbinant nieko kito, tik Jį Vienintelį) ir pulk kniūbsčiomis ir Irkai (nusilenk) kartu su Ar-Rakiūn (tais, kurie nusilenkia).“
arabic: يَٰمَرۡيَمُ ٱقۡنُتِي لِرَبِّكِ وَٱسۡجُدِي وَٱرۡكَعِي مَعَ ٱلرَّٰكِعِينَ

version.title: Lithuanian Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Lithuanian By Rowwad Translation Center with cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: yāmaryamu uq'nutī lirabbiki wa-us'judī wa-ir'kaʿī maʿa al-rākiʿīna
